artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: See individual entries Blue & purple warp.Plain weave in four sections; cream, red, light blu/green, then olive. Sections are divided bt 1/4" of dark blue plain weave. Selvedge on both sides. (royal blue, purple, cream, red, lt. green, olive)
